mapper.insert:
insert into article
id,
title,
created_time,
modified_time,
user_id,
body,

mapper.update:
update article
title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
created_time = #{createdTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
modified_time = #{modifiedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
body = #{body,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update article set title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, created_time = #{createdTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, modified_time = #{modifiedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, body = #{body,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
